title: DDOS

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: We we're playing 5 man premade with my friends and about 9 minutes into the game all of us except one disconnected with no problem with servers or anything like that and we couldnt reconnect. A bit later we couldnt talk in Discord anymore and couldnt join the call anymore. One of these enemy players DDOS'ed us and no question about it

replies.body:
Hmmmm it kinda sounds like that game might have just crashed server side as opposed to someone being able to DDOS you simply from being in the same online game server. In the case of game crashes server-side, everyone gets booted and nobody is able to rejoin because the game no longer exists. If you were able to requeue for another match, then this is definitely what happened. 

On the flip side, it may have just been a weird hiccup in your network that disconnected you from our servers as well as Discords. In that case, you may want to adjust some settings following this [**network settings guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and test it out in a practice match.
